channel.title: 1 ERROR! Please help...!
channel.description:
I got 2 errors here.... I tried to add "black knight titan boss" then when I compiled, I got errors... :(
PLEASE HELP !!! :(
Here they are:
[code]NPCHandler.java:390: illegal start of expression if (npcs[i].npcType == 1645 || ^ NPCHandler.java:389: not a statement npcs[i].npcType == 1913 || npcs[i].npcType == 1241 || ^ 2 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Trykk en tast for å fortsette...[/code]

item.title: 1 ERROR! Please help...!
item.dc:creator: @Faiter_1 Faiter 1
item.description:
@Faiter_1 wrote:

Got this error:

NPCHandler.java:1864: illegal start of expression public static int worldmap[][] = { ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Trykk en tast for å fortsette...

^^What does this^^ mean…? illegal start…

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2008, 10:06:17 AM[/size][hr]Still need help!!

I’ll REP +++++++++++++++++ 100000000 times if you help me out!!!

PLEASE!!!

item.title: 1 ERROR! Please help...!
item.dc:creator: @Faiter_1 Faiter 1
item.description:
@Faiter_1 wrote:

[quote=“lov3_rs_money, post:12, topic:185385”][quote author=Faiter 1 link=topic=247669.msg2083572#msg2083572 date=1204468216]
Wait, now i only got 1 error!!! w00000t

NPCHandler.java:389: not a statement npcs[i].npcType == 1913 || npcs[i].npcType == 1241; ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Trykk en tast for å fortsette...
[/quote]

this is what it should look like? This is an example off mine;

					if (npcs[i].npcType == 1268 || npcs[i].npcType == 1266) {

Hope it helps,

~Lov3_rs_money[/quote]

Then I get this:

NPCHandler.java:1614: illegal start of expression public static boolean IsDropping = false; ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Trykk en tast for å fortsette...
